q1: What an achievement by Croatia in this last World Cup
a1: I didn't expect them to win
q2: How were they so underrated this year?
a2: Croatia is a small country without a real "superstar" player and they haven't made it out of the group stage since 1998.
q3: What country do you think will surprise us next year similar to what Croatia did to many of us this year?
a3: Well it will be in 4 years actually. I hope England will!
q4: Do you think Croatia could beat England?
a4: They have beat them in this world cup,so definitely
